input.sentences: we visited the fair and rode the ferris wheel .
it took us so high up in the air .
then we rode a side that spun us around so fast .
there was so many rides that spun us around .
after that we rode rides until it was dark outside .
output.sentences: I really love the ferris wheel and I want to ride it.
I'm afraid I won't make it to the ferris wheel in time since the sun is about to set.
There are a lot of rides in the way of me and that ferris wheel.
I walk past some fast-moving rides that don't appeal to me like the ferris wheel does.
No matter what I do, it's still too far away. I won't make it in time.
